column5: GEEP ( John st Barrie) will accept electrconic waste ( pc ,tvs etc) on April 22 ( earth day) for no charge   Saves the tipping fee at the dump!  TB

Unless John is a member and registered with the WEE program from the ministry of the environment he would be in huge trouble for collecting Electronic Waste.  Especially bad is computer monitors and TV sets in other words  lead lined picture tubes
Globel Electric Electronic Processing has a location in Barrie on John St.  http://www.geepinc.com/index.php

John St. Barrie is fully registered.  He is also a very good fisherman.  I fished with him last year in a Bass tournament in Muskoka.  John St. Barrie and his wife Mary St. Barrie had a son last autumn.  They named him Owen St. Barrie.  They also have an older daughter name Anne St. Barrie.
